nameEntry.part: University of Alberta. Office of the Dean of Men

biogHist.p: The Office of the Dean of Men and Foreign Student Advisor, established in 1960, had the responsibility to advise and assist male students, to supervise fraternities and to assist with student discipline. The Office acted as coordinator for Canadian University Services Overseas (CUSO) and the Canadian International Development Agency. The functions of the office were assumed by the Office of the Dean of Student in 1976. Dean of Men: 1960-1975 Roland Charles Wilkins Hooper.
